page.title: 03LOCAL HISTORY
page.content: A FEW DEVELOPMENTS IN THE AREA HAVE BEEN INHABITED FOR MANY HUNDREDS OF YEARS AND THE PLACE NAMES GIVE SOME INDICATION OF THIS. THE CHIEF SETTLEMENT OF THE AREA{STOKE CLIMSLAND IS{RECORDED}IN THE{1086 DOOMESDAY {BOOK.}THE DERIVATION OF ITS NAME APPEARS TO BE 'THE CHIEF TOWN OR PLACE IN CLEMENTS LAND'.WELLS HAVE ALWAYS BEEN A NECESSITY OF LIFE AND A NEARBY HAMLET IS NAMED {LIDWELL}AFTER{LADY- {WELL. HOLWELL}WOULD APPEAR TO INDICATE THE PRESENCE OF A{HOLY WELL.}THE LINK BETWEEN{ST. MARY'S ABBEY TAVISTOCK}AND THE AREA SEEMS TO BE CONFIRMED BY THE NUMBER OF NAMES RELATED TO THE{VIRGIN {MARY, MAERFIELD MEADOW}NEAR{HAMPT}AND {MEARFIELD}NEAR{HIGHERLAND}BEING EXAMPLES. ON THE DEFINITIVE ORDANANCE SURVEY MAP THE AREA KNOWN AS HIGHERLAND IS SHOWN AS{'IRELAND'}NO CONNECTION WITH THE COUNTRY IS KNOWN.
